title: optimize parsed sql and routed sql metrics
body:
Fixes #23629.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Add `parsed_sql_total metric`
  - Add `routed_sql_total metric`
  - Remove `routed_insert_sql_total, routed_update_sql_total, routed_delete_sql_total, routed_select_sql_total`
  - Remove `parsed_insert_sql_total, parsed_update_sql_total, parsed_delete_sql_total, parsed_select_sql_total, parsed_ddl_total, parsed_dcl_total, parsed_dal_total, parsed_tcl_total, parsed_rql_total, parsed_rdl_total, parsed_ral_total, parsed_rul_total`
---

title: Update Apache ShardingSphere Release Guide
body:
Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Update ShardingSphere Release Guide based on 5.3.1 release operations

### Types of changes
- Reduce operation errors
- Simplify operation
- Speed up operation

### Two changes to speed up ShardingSphere source code downloading

1, In `Prepare Branch for Release` stage, optimize git clone from local repository instead of remote repository.

Before:
```
git clone --branch ${name} https://github.com/apache/shardingsphere.git ~/shardingsphere
```

After:
```
cd ~
git clone ~/open_source/shardingsphere
```

2, In `Deploy the Release` stage, optimize git clone from local repository instead of remote repository by `-DlocalCheckout=true`.

Before:
```
mvn release:prepare -Prelease -Darguments="-DskipTests -Dspotless.apply.skip=true" -DautoVersionSubmodules=true -DpushChanges=false -Dusername=${Github 用户名}

[INFO] 2/3 perform:checkout-project-from-scm
[INFO] Checking out the project to perform the release ...
[INFO] Executing: /bin/sh -c cd '/Users/sandynz/open_source/shardingsphere/target' && 'git' 'clone' '--depth' '1' '--branch' '5.3.1' 'https:********@github.com/apache/shardingsphere.git' 'checkout'
```

After:
```
mvn release:prepare -Prelease -Darguments="-DskipTests -Dspotless.apply.skip=true" -DautoVersionSubmodules=true -DpushChanges=false -DlocalCheckout=true -Dusername=${Github 用户名}

[INFO] 2/3 perform:checkout-project-from-scm
[INFO] Performing a LOCAL checkout from scm:git:file:///Users/sandynz/open_source/shardingsphere
[INFO] Checking out the project to perform the release ...
[INFO] Executing: /bin/sh -c cd '/Users/sandynz/open_source/shardingsphere/target' && 'git' 'clone' '--depth' '1' '--branch' '5.3.1' 'file:///Users/sandynz/open_source/shardingsphere' 'checkout'
```

title: Force to build on JDK 11+
body:
It sould be helpful to fix https://github.com/apache/shardingsphere/issues/19990 and https://github.com/apache/shardingsphere/issues/20935

Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Force to use `JDK 11` above to build shardingsphere
  - We still run all the e2e tests on `JDK 8` to make sure there is no compatitable issues.
  - https://github.com/apache/shardingsphere/issues/19990 which needs to run `antlr-maven-plugin` to generate the parser classes. The antlr Tool are only for `JDK 11` after upgrading to 4.10.1. So if upgrading `antlr`, it will force user to build shardingsphere with `JDK 11`

It seems that we need to support  `JDK 8` for a long time. There is no such plan to drop it, see the relevant discussion https://lists.apache.org/thread/kgtfx5vnw73o61lkvdshyfvjfvvzk3js

Before committing this PR, I'm sure that I have checked the following options:
- [ ] My code follows the [code of conduct](https://shardingsphere.apache.org/community/en/involved/conduct/code/) of this project.
- [ ] I have self-reviewed the commit code.

- [ ] I have passed maven check locally : `./mvnw clean install -B -T1C -Dmaven.javadoc.skip -Dmaven.jacoco.skip -e`.
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation.
- [ ] I have added corresponding unit tests for my changes.

title: Agent: refactor of Agent log output implementation and package directory structure
body:
Fixes #23508.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Refactor of `Agent` log output implementation
  - Adjust the `Agent` packaging structure
  - Add `logback.xml` for `Agent`
  - Optimize `Agent` plugin packaging
  - Update `Agent` IT test
  - Modify `eclipse-temurin:8-jdk-alpine` in `Agent` test to `eclipse-temurin:8-jdk` to support `ARM` architecture

---
